channel.title: Help with wamp
channel.description:
When i install wamp and start it and try to go to phpmyadmin it loads and says access denied and i get the error below
Error MySQL said:
#2003 - Can't connect to MySQL server on 'localhost' (10061)
any ideas how to fix this??
Also i have phptraid on my computer that i use to code webpages locally before i host on the web...could this be effecting it?

item.title: Help with wamp

item.description:
@anc13nts1 wrote:

Your still trying to make a rsc server? Are you the one person on my msn?

item.title: Help with wamp
item.dc:creator: @Deathman17 Deathman17
item.description:
@Deathman17 wrote:

i figured it out thanks i was right it was my phptraid…when it started apache it loaded up both at the same time canceling out both

Read full topic

item.title: Help with wamp
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

[quote=“Deathman17, post:1, topic:234556”]When i install wamp and start it and try to go to phpmyadmin it loads and says access denied and i get the error below

Error
MySQL said:

#2003 - Can’t connect to MySQL server on ‘localhost’ (10061)

any ideas how to fix this??

Also i have phptraid on my computer that i use to code webpages locally before i host on the web…could this be effecting it?[/quote]

YOur phptraid could be be affecting wamp since im gussing that your phptraid and wamp use the same port.

Read full topic
